Registered just to say this: I love you for including a Non-English only subtitles file. I've DL'd too many movies that include only all English, or none at all. I'd have to search all over the internet for a suitable file, and a match is rare at best. So thank you, and keep up the good work!
@username yes there is!! You must not have the right codecs...

SIgned up just to post a comment. many thnaks for the nice encoding - please do not listen to people who ask you reduce the size of the file - high bit rate is what we need. I mean, if you are encoding 720P with high compression, you are pretty much loosing the quality. I saw another 720P rip out there with 2 CHANNEL audio !! can you believe it, just 2 channels - whats wrong with ppl.. why would you have high def video with 2 channel audio.. anyways good work mate ..
